author: Duchstf
body:
#### PR description:

Hello, this PR updates the Tau NN training in the L1 trigger. The main changes include:


- Adding HW option for the tau as well as the new e/m seeding for tau jets.
- Updated Tau NN training with the lastest training samples.
- GT formatting for Tau Jets.


#### PR validation:

The improvements in performance is documented in the following talks:

- https://indico.cern.ch/event/1246470/
- https://indico.cern.ch/event/1271855/#202-performance-report-algorit

The new cmssw performance has been cross-checked by the L1 team and the results are included in the [2023 L1 Annual Review.](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1257943/contributions/5343040/attachments/2633523/4562436/AlgorithmsAndPerformance_2023_2.pdf) 

The original PR with related discussions/checks is here: https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1087
title: Retrained L1 Tau Trigger Integration
